channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The ultralight gummy bear power bank just got yanked from Amazon
item.description: Amazon just yanked the Haribo gummy bear power bank from its website and is canceling orders for the ultralight device. In an email sent to customers, Amazon says it has “learned of a potential safety or quality issue” regarding the power bank, and that it’s not charging customers who recently purchased it. The gummy bear […]

item.title: Sony’s New PlayStation Monitor Has a Handy Hook for Charging Your Controller
item.description: PlayStation is no longer just a console; it's now a full-fledged family of gaming gear for PC gaming.

item.title: Les Galaxy S26 seraient très performants en photo, mais pas grâce à leurs capteurs
item.description: Selon une source bien renseignée, les futurs Galaxy S26 de Samsung feraient bien mieux que leurs prédécesseurs sur la partie photo. Les capteurs n'ont cependant rien à voir là-dedans.

item.title: Galaxy S26, Plus et Ultra : date de sortie, prix, caractéristiques, tout ce qu’il faut savoir
item.description: Chaque année, Samsung nous livre sa nouvelle fournée de Galaxy S, mais 2026 pourrait bien marquer une rupture. Voici ce qu'il faut attendre des Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26 Plus et Galaxy S26 Ultra.

item.title: SAP fixes serious security issues - here's how to stay safe
item.description: Two critical severity bugs were recently fixed, with users are advised to apply the patch without delay.

item.title: Avant le Black Friday, voici les meilleurs deals sur les smartphones pas chers : Samsung Galaxy, Xiaomi Redmi, Nothing Phone… et plus
item.description: Si le Black Friday se fera attendre jusqu'à la fin du mois, les e-commerçants français n'ont eux pas attendu pour lancer des offres. Les smartphones font partie des produits qui profitent de réductions vraiment intéressantes, notamment sur l'entrée et le milieu de gamme.

item.title: Nomad’s new wallet tracking card gets a battery life boost
item.description: Nomad released a new version of its tracking card designed to be carried in wallets or billfolds that comes with a big boost to battery life. Its new Tracking Card Pro will last for up to 16 months on a full charge, while the standard version maxes out at up to five months. It’s available […]

item.title: 13 Great Gifts for Mom: Ideas for the Best Mother (2025)
item.description: From high-tech skin care to cool accessories, these are our favorite picks for the WIRED mom in your life.

item.title: Netflix’s new Luther movie will resurrect a fan-favorite character after a six-year absence – and there’s one question I really hope it answers
item.description: Luther is getting a second movie at Netflix, and it seems like they're finally going to confirm the fate of a long-awaited character.

item.title: Heavy solar storms could trigger northern lights and more, according to NOAA
item.description: The severe geomagnetic storms could produce colorful auroras but also disrupt communications. Space weather forecasters issued an alert on Tuesday for incoming severe solar storms that could produce colorful northern lights and temporarily disrupt communications.In the past few days, the sun has burped out several bursts of energy called coronal mass ejections that could reach Earth Tuesday night and early Wednesday. The potential severe geomagnetic storms could disrupt radio and GPS communications, according to forecasters with the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration.How bright th...

item.title: For the first time in the show's history, The Game Awards 2025 will be streamed live on Amazon Prime Video
item.description: The Game Awards has announced that this year's show will be streamed live on Amazon Prime Video for the very first time.

item.title: Early Black Friday eSIM deals 2025: exclusive offers from top providers
item.description: Planning your winter getaway? I am tracking the best early Black Friday eSIM deals.

item.title: Blue Origin delays second New Glenn launch again due to solar storms
item.description: The same solar activity that's been lighting up the night sky in North America is causing this particular delay.

item.title: Désinformation, deepfake… L’UE présente son « bouclier démocratique » contre l’ingérence étrangère
item.description: Pour lutter contre la désinformation et l'ingérence étrangère sur les réseaux sociaux, Bruxelles a présenté, ce mercredi 12 novembre, son « bouclier démocratique ». Voici ce qu'il faut en retenir.

item.title: Hate Meta? Even Realities Is Making the Smart Glasses You Want
item.description: The company announced the Even G2 smart glasses, sporting a bigger display in a lighter frame, alongside the R1 smart ring, which can control the display on the lenses.

item.title: Une musique générée par IA est quasi impossible à distinguer d’une vraie selon Deezer
item.description: Les résultats d'une étude internationale commandée par Deezer viennent de tomber. Ils montrent que quasiment personne ne fait la différence entre une chanson générée par IA et une vraie.

item.title: Airbnb’s testing a ‘kitchen stocking’ service that lets guests place Instacart orders before their stay
item.description: Airbnb will offer the "kitchen stocking" service during a three-month pilot program starting on January 5, according to an email sent to hosts.

item.title: The Best Pixel 10 Cases and Accessories (2025)
item.description: Slap a case and screen protector on your shiny new Pixel, whether you have the Pixel 10 or Pixel 10 Pro XL. We also have Qi2 chargers and accessory recommendations.

item.title: Xiaomi profite du pré-Black Friday pour brader ses produits les plus populaires : les 14 offres à saisir
item.description: Le pré-Black Friday bat son plein depuis plus d'une semaine, et Xiaomi en profite pour multiplier les promotions sur l'ensemble de ses produits phares. Smartphones, tablettes, objets connectés et équipements maison, tout y passe… : voici les offres qui méritent toute votre attention.

item.title: On sait enfin ce qu’est vraiment l’objet interstellaire qui traverse le Système solaire, et pourquoi il est unique
item.description: L’objet interstellaire 3I/Atlas vient de réapparaître de derrière notre Soleil. Et certains pensent avoir vu, dans les dernières images publiées par les astronomes, des preuves de son explosion. Mais c’est surtout un signal radio capté par des chercheurs qui intrigue aujourd’hui…

item.title: Black Friday smartphones : même les derniers iPhone d’Apple sont à prix cassé dans ce top 11 des meilleures offres premium
item.description: Cela commence à devenir une tradition chez les e-commerçants, le Black Friday commence tôt, et même très tôt. Depuis deux semaines, les promotions pleuvent sur les Samsung Galaxy, iPhone, Xiaomi et Google Pixel et ça ne se calme pas ! Voici les meilleures offres sur les smartphones premium.

item.title: 5 things I love about Amazon’s new Echo Shows — and 3 things I don’t
item.description: Amazon's newest Echo Show smart displays launch this week. They're purpose-built for the new AI-powered Alexa Plus, which comes preloaded in the US. I've had a couple of days to play with them, and I have some early thoughts to share. Overall, the devices are a significant upgrade from the last-gen Show 8 and aging […]

item.title: The Verge’s 2025 holiday gift guide for teens
item.description: Between keeping up with TikTok trends and whatever new gadget just dropped, it's tough to know exactly what teens are into these days. Luckily, we can help. We may be older than teenagers, but many of us here at The Verge are kids at heart. Plus, we've also got a few staffers with older kids. […]

item.title: I finished Little Nightmares 3, but I don’t think the developers did
item.description: Little Nightmares 3 has solid foundations in its predecessors, but its lack of ambition and heart makes for a dull and uninspired playthrough.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Thursday, November 13 (game #620)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Thursday, November 13 (game #1389)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Thursday, November 13 (game #886)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: Toy Story 5 trailer takes on tech and AI as its brand-new villains, but there’s something bigger to worry about
item.description: Toy Story 5's first trailer officially pits toys and tech against each other, but all the sequels are meshing into something far worse.

item.title: Sorry Elite Series 2, mobile accessory maker Backbone just unveiled the ultimate Xbox controller
item.description: Backbone has just unveiled a new Xbox mobile controller.

item.title: Nvidia GeForce Now en novembre 2025 : voici les 23 nouveaux jeux du mois, dont le dernier Call of Duty et un souls-like chinois
item.description: Après le succès de Battlefield 6, la planète gaming se prépare à l'arrivée de Call of Duty : Black Ops 7 qui sera disponible Day One sur la plateforme GeForce Now. Mais ce n'est pas la seule sortie attendue comme vous allez le voir.

item.title: Le Google Pixel 9 Pro devient moins cher que le nouveau Pixel 10 grâce à cette offre du pré-Black Friday
item.description: Le Pixel 9 Pro est l'ancien smartphone haut de gamme de Google, mais quand il devient moins cher que la version non Pro du Pixel 10, y'a de quoi se poser des questions, surtout pour la partie photo. On le trouve en effet sur Amazon à 649 euros au lieu de 1 199 euros à l'occasion des offres du pré-Black Friday.

item.title: Top infostealer disrupted after criminals lose server access
item.description: The Rhadamanthys infostealer has been disrupted, possibly by German law enforcement.

item.title: House of Marley’s new noise-cancelling headphones offer the best battery life I’ve ever seen – and they’re not even expensive
item.description: House of Marley's new headphones have a colossal 130 hours of battery life

item.title: Mint Mobile's epic Black Friday Google Pixel 10 deal gets you $800 off without a trade-in
item.description: Mint's record-breaking deal on the Pixel 10 gets you $800 off without a trade or pricey plan this Black Friday.

item.title: Black Friday sur les montres connectées : voici les offres déjà disponibles chez Apple, Garmin, Xiaomi, Suunto…
item.description: Nous ne sommes que mi-novembre, mais les promotions débarquent avant l’heure. Ce pré-Black Friday met à l’honneur les montres connectées et les bracelets, orientés sport ou lifestyle. Tour d’horizon des meilleures offres déjà proposées par les e-commerçants pour s'offrir une smartwach à prix cassé.

item.title: Le cloud IA de Google promet de ne jamais voir vos données
item.description: Le géant du web veut prouver qu’IA et vie privée peuvent cohabiter. Avec Private AI Compute, Google entend offrir la rapidité du cloud sans compromettre la confidentialité : les données resteraient invisibles, même pour l'entreprise.

item.title: Steam Deck 2, console de salon, manette, casque VR : ce que l’on sait des projets de Valve
item.description: Valve semble avoir dans les cartons de nombreux projets. Le projet Fremont, Steam Frame ou encore Deckard, faisons le point sur les rumeurs et fuites.

item.title: The Super Mario Galaxy Movie shoots for the stars in first trailer
item.description: The first full Super Mario Galaxy Movie trailer has finally landed, and it looks like Nintendo and Illumination are doing it big for their next animated feature. Though there are a few shots of the Mushroom Kingdom and a very miniscule Bowser (Jack Black) imprisoned in a tiny castle, The Super Mario Galaxy Movie‘s new […]

item.title: How delayed SNAP benefits are hurting small U.S. grocers and convenience stores
item.description: The Trump administration’s cutoff of SNAP benefits has had an immediate impact on grocers, which already operate on slim profit margins. A little more than a year ago, Ryan Sprankle welcomed President Donald Trump to one of the three grocery stores his family owns near Pittsburgh. Trump was on the campaign trail; they talked about high grocery prices, and the Republican nominee picked up a bag of popcorn.But these days, Sprankle would have a different message if Trump or any lawmakers visited his store. He wants them to know that delayed SNAP benefits during the government shutdown hurt his cu...

item.title: Circle Internet Group stock is sliding despite strong revenue and higher average USDC in circulation
item.description: The stablecoin issuer has seen its share price swing wildly since its market debut in June. It just reported its second earnings as a public company. Circle Internet Group released its third-quarter earnings on Wednesday, November 12, announcing a 66% jump in revenue and reserve income year-over-year (YOY). The $740 million figure stemmed, in large part, from a 97% increase YOY of average USDC in circulation. ...

item.title: CMF Headphone Pro could easily cost twice as much – and even if the sound is fun and fierce (rather than fully fledged fantastic) they're still a great buy
item.description: The detailed listening tests, circumaural sound and on-ear extras make for an ideal set of cans for this level – a resounding win for CMF

item.title: Windows 11 boosts security even further by adding native 1Password passkey support
item.description: 1Password Windows 11 integration allows users to sign in to apps and services using Windows Hello.

item.title: Samsung n’hésite pas à casser le prix de ses produits Galaxy et autres durant le pré-Black Friday
item.description: Le pré-Black Friday a débuté il y a plus d’une semaine et les produits Samsung n’ont pas été épargnés. Des références récentes telles que le Galaxy S25 Ultra profite de remises inédites, ce qui permet de s’équiper avec la dernière génération à moindre coût pendant toute cette période promotionnelle.

item.title: UN climate talks are getting weird
item.description: One of the most consequential rounds of global climate negotiations has kicked off in Belém, Brazil. Leaders from nearly every country in the world - but notably, not the US - are gathering to try to ramp up action on climate change during a time of tremendous transformation when it comes to both energy systems […]

item.title: The First ‘Super Mario Galaxy’ Trailer Blasts Off
item.description: Chris Pratt, Jack Black, Anya Taylor-Joy, Charlie Day, and others return for the Nintendo sequel, out April 2026.

item.title: Another Billionaire ‘Crypto Queen’ Will Be Spending More Than a Decade Behind Bars
item.description: The latest queen fled to the United Kingdom to reap the rewards of a multi-billion dollar Ponzi scheme.

item.title: Hackers hijacked antivirus features to install malware - here's what we know
item.description: Gladinet Triofox was abused to deploy remote desktop tools and achieve lateral movement capabilities.

item.title: La période du Black Friday regorge de bons plans, mais voici le TOP 50 des meilleures offres
item.description: Avant le coup d'envoi officiel du vendredi noir à la fin du mois, les offres se multiplient et deviennent de plus en plus intéressantes. D'un côté, il y a le pré-Black Friday chez la majorité des e-commerçants français comme Boulanger, Fnac Darty, Amazon et Cdiscount, et de l'autre côté, il y a aussi le Singles Day, ou 11.11, chez AliExpress et consorts. Vous retrouverez les meilleures offres des deux événements dans cet article. ...

item.title: These Open Earbuds Might Be the Bose Competitor You’ve Been Waiting For
item.description: Soundpeats' Clip1 open wireless earbuds are pulling out all the stops to court audiophiles.

item.title: Gore Verbinski’s New Movie Looks Like the Wildest Thing Ever
item.description: 'Good Luck, Have Fun, Don't Die' stars Sam Rockwell as a time traveler trying to save the world. It's out February 13.

item.title: This tiny, affordable 1TB flash drive could save you up to $300 on your next MacBook Air – here's how
item.description: The SanDisk Extreme Fit is a new 1TB thumb drive, and it could be a great way to get more storage on a MacBook Air or other laptop.

item.title: Google relaunches Cameyo to entice businesses from Windows to ChromeOS
item.description: After acquiring software virtualization company Cameyo last year, Google has relaunched a version of the service that makes it easier for Windows-based organizations to migrate over to ChromeOS. Now called “Cameyo by Google,” the Virtual App Delivery (VAD) solution allows users to run legacy Windows apps in the Chrome browser or as web apps, preventing […]...

item.title: These new clip open earbuds cost just $50 at launch, and come from one of the best budget earbuds makers – who needs Black Friday?
item.description: Soundpeats' new Clip1 are incredibly affordable anyway for headphones with hi-res specs, and are going in hard at launch

item.title: Vie numérique | Comment l’abandon de CarPlay par les constructeurs pourrait vous coûter cher
item.description: CarPlay et Android Auto. Les consommateurs adorent ces interfaces pour la voiture tirées de leur téléphone intelligent. Mais elles sont sur la voie de sortie. Des milliards en revenus annuels potentiels font saliver les constructeurs, qui aimeraient voir les automobilistes s’abonner à leurs propres services plutôt qu’à ceux d’Apple et de Google.

item.title: Gare aux fichiers ZIP partagés sur des sites web, ils peuvent cacher le virus GootLoader
item.description: GootLoader refait surface. Depuis fin octobre 2025, les cybercriminels exploitent massivement des sites WordPress renfermant le malware pour piéger les internautes. Derrière une simple archive ZIP, GootLoader peut installer, en toute discrétion, des ransomwares et d'autres logiciels malveillants sur votre ordinateur.

item.title: Elden Ring Nightreign’s first big DLC arrives in December
item.description: Elden Ring Nightreign is keeping things fresh with downloadable content that will add additional playable characters, bosses, and a new area. The Forsaken Hollows DLC costs $15 and launches on December 4th, but players who purchase or own Elden Ring Nightreign’s deluxe or collector’s editions will receive it for free. Elden Ring Nightreign launched in […]...

item.title: Sony’s new PlayStation gaming monitor has a charging stand for the DualSense controller
item.description: Sony announced a new 27-inch monitor for the PlayStation 5 targeting console gamers who prefer playing on a desk. The monitor features a 2,560 x 1,440 resolution, supports HDR with automatic HDR tone mapping during setup, and variable refresh rates of up to 120Hz when connected to the PS5 or PS5 Pro, or up to […]
